title: SpinCraft

creator: Sneaky Panda Games
descriptionHtml:
Hit the perfect combo and win big in the ultimate roguelike deck builder game! Tap, build and craft your own fruit machine to beat the puzzle.

Crafting and collecting is simple: Tap, spin and win unique items that will help you level up. Collect legendary symbols with every spin to earn more coins and level up in this slots money game. Legendary, common, rare and more — the possibilities are endless. Craft your winning lineup!

Deck building meets puzzle in this epic roguelike. Match dozens of symbols, unlock special FX and progress through the ranks! Puzzle gameplay requires strategy and the perfect combo to see your fruit machine grow!

Luck may get you far, but strategy will be necessary to reach the leaderboards. Strategically choose your moves to conquer this puzzle game and rank amongst the top players! Enjoy fun, competitive play against others, or try for your personal best. How far can you go? Will you be the best in the world?

Enjoy this roguelike deck builder and download SpinCraft today - where every game is unique!

SPINCRAFT FEATURES:

Puzzle Slots Game:
- Tap to spin and become a collector of parts!
- Crafting your own fruit machine will take time, use strategy to do it right.
- This builder takes strategy and a little bit of luck.
- The ultimate roguelike game - Mega combos are waiting to be discovered!

Craft & Level Up:
- Collect items and unlock special rewards to level up in this deck builder.
- Spin and win new powerful items to use in your next strategic play!
- Match similar items to create mega synergies that earn more coins.
- A winning strategy and perfect combo will have you leveling up in no time!

Compete or Set Personal Bests:
- Strategy required to conquer SpinCraft leaderboards!
- This puzzle game gives you fun, competitive play.
- Tap and collect, then play to win!
- Make strategic moves to beat your own personal bests.
